s.text: Now, imagine when all those cell-phoners start browsing the Web through their smart phones ...
Now, imagine when all those cell-phoners start browsing the Web through their smart phones ...
Again, it's easy to leap to the wrong conclusions when you wander around Hong Kong and see how wired everyone is.
The thing that I think will totally mess up businesspeople when they consider Hong Kong and, to a different degree, the rest of China, is the extent to which e-commerce--and the Net--will catch on.
